author: makortel
body:
This PR switches TrackWithVertexRefSelector to EDProducer (I intend to use it in EndPath soon). There were no existing uses for the event filtering, so it should be ok. I also removed obsolete(?) configuration files under `PhysicsTools/RecoAlgos` as the ones in `CommonTools/RecoAlgos` look better maintained, the code is in the same package, and nobody imported the `PhysicsTools`-configurations.

Tested in 760pre6, no changes expected in results.
title: Switch TrackWithVertexRefSelector to ObjectSelectorStreamProducer, and remove its obsolete configuration files
